Reviews.Title: “Perfect Location, Great Staff!”
Reviews.Author: MimiTravels_TX
Reviews.Content: venice days glad found hotel tripadvisor hotel noemi incredibly close san marco plaza short walk rialto bridge staff amazing incredibly helpful arrived actually upgraded deluxe reserved economy beautiful clean comfortable breakfast served morning sweet hotel staff brought cappucinos im actually shocked negative reviews placeyes climb stairs travel europe especially venice familiar toting luggage stay character love hotels character service location location locationthis perfect definitely recommend friends eat restaurant plans night packed

Reviews.Title: “Location!!!Price!!!Breakfast!!!”
Reviews.Author: JenPK
Reviews.Content: wow location perfect price hotel winner nice common europe breakfast stayed hotels italy week visit yummy stocked compared read fine print internet free hour didnt venice internet free internet expect free entire time bring dogs 1 medium 1 happy hard time emailed booked told coming dogs shouldnt surprise anyways deal staff rude entire trip overall return poor service beat price location probably dogs

Reviews.Title: “Location ! Location ! Location!”
Reviews.Author: sadie520
Reviews.Content: visited venice stayed hotel noemi boutique hotel located 2 minute walk st marks square 10 minute walk rialto bridge hotel beautifully decorated typical venetian style pay attention spectacular hand blown glass hand rail enter hotel floor venetian chandelier hanging ceiling details beautiful venice hotels pricey noemi reasonbly priced clean cost includes delicious continental breakfast fresh pastries fruit cheeses meats time stayed spacious queen size bed twin bed period desk armoire appointed bathroom realize located comparison hotels happy

Reviews.Title: “OK in a pinch”
Reviews.Author: MplsJen
Reviews.Content: spent six nights single hotel noemi september 2011 booked six weeks advance arrival found hotel rates 75 hotels venice available location close major sites single adequate youre looking park stuff explore venice hotel noemi fine hand youre looking relaxing spend time id suggest hotels dark clean relatively quiet breakfasts expected based reviews expectations low

Reviews.Title: “Great location BUT beware!”
Reviews.Author: Mary S
Reviews.Content: hotel web site impressed husband celebrating 30th wedding anniversary planned trip rome florence venice impression previous reviewers found ground floor luggage elevator reception overlooking checked decorated elegantly expected discovered sink leaked piece held shower head broken exposed wires hairdryer unacceptable considering paying compared 3 star hotels stayed reported girl note repair location recommend disappointed guests talked breakfast found hotel staff aloof helpful

Reviews.Content: hotel location close san marcos square rialto bridge isnt staff friendly wouldnt helpful didnt breakfast included cost time served tiny poor lighting bathroom user friendly water stood sinks shower draining found hotel location issues

Reviews.Title: “Great little hotel!”

Reviews.Content: stayed hotel noemi september 2011 lobby feel particulary noisy charmingly decorated clean adored gentleman front desk staff pleasant helpful stayed hotel week trip multiply cities lobby flight street help bags found commonly trip standards relatively italy breakfast bar typical bread cheese fresh fruit coffee enjoyed stay recommend hotel travellers

Reviews.Content: recently stayed hotel noemi double standard adequate beautifully decorated comfortable noise streets below thats norm cities pair ear plugs cant solve service helpful friendly happy location literally 2 min walk san marco square opinion selling hotel bravo hotel noemi im staying else venice
